name: StockOS 2
description:
StockOS 2 makes operating systems easier and better to use than StockOS 1! Use StockOS 2 today, with it's new exciting features:

-Hide the gadgets

-Music player (yep)

-More wallpapers

And more!

Use StockOS 2 today!

STOCKOS 1: https://thebsoder.itch.io/stockos <--- MAKE SURE TO READ THE RUNNING PROGRAM AND EDITING SOURCE CODE REQUIREMENTS!

The same things listed in StockOS 1 for running the program and editing the source code apply to StockOS 2.
